mapper.select:
select
from g_share_log where del = 0
and g_share_log.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.search1},'%')

SELECT a.user_id,a.share_id,a.share_money,a.check_time,a.account_id,b.user_name FROM g_share_log a LEFT JOIN g_user b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` WHERE a.check_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) AND a.check_time > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AND a.reward_type = 1 AND a.is_pass = 1 ORDER BY a.sl_id DESC

SELECT a.user_id,a.share_id,a.share_money,a.check_time,a.account_id,b.user_name FROM g_share_log a LEFT JOIN g_user b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` WHERE a.reward_type = 1 AND a.is_pass = 1 ORDER BY a.sl_id DESC limit 0,20

SELECT a.user_id,a.share_id,a.account_id,c.avatar_hd , a.`sl_id` FROM g_share_log AS a LEFT JOIN g_user_account AS c ON c.account_id = a.account_id LEFT JOIN g_share_log g ON g.share_id = a.share_id WHERE a.`share_id` = #{i} AND a.sl_id < g.sl_id GROUP BY a.user_id,a.share_id,a.account_id,c.avatar_hd,sl_id ORDER BY `sl_id` DESC LIMIT 0,4

SELECT a.user_id,a.share_id,a.account_id,c.avatar_hd,a.sl_id FROM g_share_log a LEFT JOIN g_user_account c ON c.account_id=a.account_id LEFT JOIN g_share_log g ON g.share_id = a.share_id AND a.sl_id < g.sl_id WHERE a.share_id =#{shareId} GROUP BY a.user_id,a.share_id,a.account_id,c.avatar_hd,a.sl_id HAVING COUNT(g.share_id) <= 4 ORDER BY a.sl_id DESC

SELECT share_id,share_coin,share_money,reward_type,a.account_id,account_name,account_avatar,avatar_hd,a.add_time,acc_type FROM g_share_log a LEFT JOIN g_user_account c ON c.account_id=a.account_id WHERE a.share_id = #{share_id} ORDER BY sl_id DESC
